message.body: Hey Sofie - great to meet you Saturday. That was such an awesome wedding! We should hang out some time... Maybe go for another twirl on the dance floor ;-)
Maxime! Hello. Yes what a wedding that was, I still feel like a princess from this weekends festivities. My feet are killing me from all fun and dancing still, but what about a drink sometime?
That sounds great, I'll be in touch!
